text: Cauer is a German surname. This surname is shared by the following people: * Ludwig Cauer (1866–1947), German sculptor * Minna Cauer (1841–1922), German educator, journalist and radical activist within the middle-class women's movement * Wilhelm Cauer (1900–1945), German mathematician and scientist == See also == * Kauer Category:German-language surnames
title: Cauer
